message.example: Transaction payload was successfully passed to the network node.

logoCid.description: content id (CID) of logo uploaded to IPFS

owner.description: factory owner which initiate token create transaction, in lisk32 format

price.description: current price of the token, denominated in LSK

priceUSD.description: current price of the token, denominated in USD

marketCap.description: market cap obtained by price of token in LSK multiplied by supply

marketCapUSD.description: market cap obtained by price of token in USD multiplied by supply

data.description: List of tokens created by Token Factory module

chainID.description: Chain ID of the blockchain application.

chainName.description: Chain name as registered on the network

tokenID.description: The universal identifier for the token within the Lisk ecosystem.

tokenName.description: The name of the token. For example Lisk

description.example: LSK is the utility token of Lisk

decimals.description: The exponent over base 10 by which the denomination is a factor of the baseDenom. Example: 8 for LSK (1 LSK = 10^8 Beddows)

items.description: Human friendly aliases for the denomination unit

symbol.description: The symbol for the token. Example: LSK

displayDenom.description: The human friendly denomination unit of the token. Must be a 'denom' in denomUnits. Example: lsk

baseDenom.description: The base denomination unit of the token. Must be a 'denom' in denomUnits. Example: Beddows

png.description: URI to the PNG format of the token logo

svg.description: URI to the SVG format of the token logo

data.description: List of blockchain applications off-chain metadata for tokens

tokenCreated.description: number of token created by token factory module

totalMarketCap.description: total market cap of tokens created by token factory, denominated in LSK

totalMarketCapUSD.description: total market cap of tokens created by token factory, denominated in USD
